{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Human Resources Officer",
  "description": "Compovine Technologies Limited is an indigenous company with the main aim of offering Information Technology, Sales and Services to individuals and corporate organizations. Compovine Technology Limited currently has branches in Ibadan, Abuja, Lagos, Lokoja, Kano, Kaduna, Jos, Minna, Port Harcourt and Enugu, and we are still expanding.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Recruiting, interviewing, and hiring new employees
	Preparing job descriptions, posting ads, and managing the hiring process
	Providing training and counseling on policies and procedures
	Administering payroll, benefits, and remuneration issues
	Supporting the development and implementation of HR initiatives and systems.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 3 - 10 years of experience.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to:&nbsp;hr2@compovine.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-02-01",

Human Resources Officer Job at Compovine Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Compovine Technologies Limited is an indigenous company with the main aim of offering Information Technology, Sales and Services to individuals and corporate organizations. Compovine Technology Limited currently has branches in Ibadan, Abuja, Lagos, Lokoja, Kano, Kaduna, Jos, Minna, Port Harcourt and Enugu, and we are still expanding.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Officer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Recruiting, interviewing, and hiring new employees
	Preparing job descriptions, posting ads, and managing the hiring process
	Providing training and counseling on policies and procedures
	Administering payroll, benefits, and remuneration issues
	Supporting the development and implementation of HR initiatives and systems.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 3 - 10 years of experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: hr2@compovine.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Medical Representatives",
  "description": "Afrab Chem Limited is a consolidated and leading Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Company with Head office in Lagos and Area offices nationwide. We have been operating in Nigeria for the past 50 years.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Medical Representatives

Job Locations:&nbsp;Edo, Enugu, Kwara and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Conduct regular visits to healthcare providers, including doctors, pharmacies, hospitals, distributors e.t.c
	Organise and participate in clinical meetings, product presentations and other approved marketing activities to create awareness and demand for the company&#39;s products.
	Monitoring market trends to identify opportunities for growth.
	Develop a weekly itinerary based on approved KPIs, targeted products and customer needs.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;career@afrabchem.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.
Or
Submit their CV to:
The Admin. / HR Manager,
Afrab Chem LImited,
22, Abimbola Street,
Isolo Industrial Estate, Lagos State.",
  "datePosted": "2026-01-14",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-24",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Afrab Chem Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

       "streetAddress": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"

  },

Medical Representatives Job at Afrab Chem Limited




        
    

        
        Afrab Chem Limited is a consolidated and leading Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Company with Head office in Lagos and Area offices nationwide. We have been operating in Nigeria for the past 50 years.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Medical Representatives

Job Locations: Edo, Enugu, Kwara and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Conduct regular visits to healthcare providers, including doctors, pharmacies, hospitals, distributors e.t.c
	Organise and participate in clinical meetings, product presentations and other approved marketing activities to create awareness and demand for the company's products.
	Monitoring market trends to identify opportunities for growth.
	Develop a weekly itinerary based on approved KPIs, targeted products and customer needs.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@afrabchem.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.
Or
Submit their CV to:
The Admin. / HR Manager,
Afrab Chem LImited,
22, Abimbola Street,
Isolo Industrial Estate, Lagos State.    

    

        Click here to Apply
